attributes.action: Help save Brooklands Middle School from possible closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help save Brooklands Middle School, Leighton Buzzard from possible closure.    Please sign our petition.  Thankyou.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Help save Brooklands Middle School from possible closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15531.asp

Prime Minister's Office
